Title: The Hidden Master
Description:
We should be able to handle the defense of Stoneplow from here on out.

<The Watch Commander motions towards Lin Tenderpaw.>

Lin here is searching for someone she calls "The Hidden Master". I believe I know who she's talking about, and I have a clue for you.

Go north.
ObjectivesText: Find Master Bruised Paw in the Valley of the Four Winds.
RewardText:
You seek training?

<The pandaren studies your physique for several seconds, without speaking.>

Alright.
